concept.title: Reference
concept.shortdesc: A summary of related documentation for the Kernel Architecture 2 component.

section.title: API Reference
section.p: See the component reference Kernel Architecture 2.
Note: the component also provides the headers that define interfaces for other Kernel Architecture 2 components, including the User Library.

section.title: Random Number Generation APIs
section.p: For a high-level overview of the various APIs by means of which the Kernel's Cryptographically Strong Pseudo Random Number Generator (CSPRNG) can be accessed, see APIs for Accessing Random Number Generator.
